data.meta_description: Demons Are Among Us- proiect atestat engleza  - Free download as Word Doc (.doc), PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. The document discusses the origins and history of demons across various cultures and religions. It explores the etymology of the word "demon" and related terms like "devil." Names for demons are provided from traditions including Mesopotamian, ancient Arabic, Hebrew, and Christian demonology. Demonic origins and beliefs are outlined from these different religious perspectives.
